channel.title: Adding custom scripts
channel.description: Meh just updated aryan i had one of the first ones out.. i quit rs about 6 months ago when my pure got banned with about 92M or 94 M on him :s.. and 91 mage 83 str and 94 range so i desided to start back again today and get some cashs and a new pure account (Might auto to about 70 str if i can with out getting flagged then banned) and ways my question to you is how do you add custom scripts on the new aryan? I'm very curious i don't seem able to.[br][size=1]Posted at: April 12, 2006, 05:17:49 pm[/size][br][size=1]Posted at: April 12, 2006, 05:31:56 pm[/size][hr]Never mind :) ! :D I got it.

item.title: Adding custom scripts
item.dc:creator: @OArrowZO OArrowZO
item.description:
